name: GhostFood
description: Hi, this is my first game!  I would very much appreciate your thoughts on improving the game, if you are interested in the game I have many updates in mind to improve it! Plot: A cute ghost wanders around the park, when he is suddenly very hungry, can you help him?  The game was made in Game Maker studio 2, to create it I used different authors like: Pipoya, RavenTale, JustFredrik, maria inês, Fliflifly, Henry Software, Sanae.  And for the sound effects: www.zapsplat.com, https://mixkit.co/
